page.title: 11LEYS CASTLE
page.content: It covers 560 acres, mostly farmland.The owner lives in{LEYS {CASTLE}and breeds Highland cattle which have huge horns and shaggy coats.They look fierce but are very gentle. He exports them to America, Canada, Sweden and Germany. He is President of the Highland Cattle Society. The main farm is{LEYS HOME FARM} ,the others are{BRAITON OF LEYS, {BALMORE OF LEYS}and{BALVONIE OF LEYS. { }Leys Castle was rebuilt 160 years ago of sandstone cut at Cowsea Quarry, Elgin. The inside is lovely and has broadswords and backswords from the Middle and Far East. It has 9 bedrooms, all with 4_poster beds. There is a piper's gallery near the ceiling of the hall.
